attributes.action: Stop travellers leaving a mess when the leave.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop travellers leaving a mess when they leave.

Many of us have suffered due to travellers dumping waste and the council has to pay a fortune to clean up when travellers are moved on.

It is time to fight back and if it cost a £1000 to clear up their mess then council officers should be able to take goods to that value to sell to pay for the cleanup. It may be difficult to know who has dumped what and in that case, a percentage is taken from each family of travellers.
